price: Wͻn mu (Yudafoͻ no) bi yε firatamfoͻ, wͻ’nnim Nwoma no (mu), na mmom apεdeε hunu (na wͻ’di akyire), na deε wͻn adwen kyerε wͻn na wͻ'yε.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّآ أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum ummiyyūna lā yaʿlamūna al-kitāba illā amāniyya wa-in hum illā yaẓunnūna
